page.title: 02THE THEATRES OF EASTBOURNE
page.content:
{Eastbourne}has five theatres,four of which are operated by the Councill's Department of Tourism and Leisure. They provide a wide variety of entertainment including;ballet,opera, symphony concerts,variety shows,drama productions,and pop concerts. All of the theatres are used by local amatuer drama groups to stage their various productions. These groups are thriving and maintain a very high standard of performance. The main theatre is the Congress Theatre,this is also used for Business,Political and Trades Union Conferences during the winter months.
John H.McMillan
